1.18.1.1.0.6: [F] Bridging Relay added to support wire crossings.

1.18.1.1.0.4:
[A] Added Inverted Redstone Relay.
[A] Added Bi-Stable Redstone Relay.
[F] Fixed Pen/Quill model 3rd person view.

[A] Added Redstone Quill (uses Redstone directly from the inventory).
[F] Wire update when removing diagonal/orthogonal tracks fixed.
1.18.1.1.0.2-b1:
[F] Fixed placement net update of tracks around the corner.
[I] Known issue: Power update around the corner when placing not yet always working.
1.18.1.1.0.1:
[F] Fixed block removal bug (thx focsie).
[F] Fixed vanilla Redstone connection bug.
1.18.1.1.0.0:

[F] Internal mod logo image rescaled.
